description: System-generated primary key for the miscellaneous cost record.
Business code identifying the miscellaneous cost type used on work orders/invoices (e.g., labor, tax).
Readable name/description of the miscellaneous cost type shown to users.
Default unit price for this cost item; applied when the item is added to a transaction. Currency per system settings.
General ledger account to which this cost posts for financial reporting. Likely optional; confirm with SME.
Tax code or rate applied to this cost item for tax calculation. Exact meaning (code versus percent) likely varies; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the cost item.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Likely timestamp of the userâ€™s last modification; name suggests a user ID but samples show timestamps; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified the record.
Timestamp when the record was last modified.
